mapper.select:
SELECT sci.id AS `company_id`, count(sui.id) AS `number` FROM sys_company_info AS sci JOIN sys_staff_info AS ssi ON ssi.comp_id = sci.id JOIN sys_user_info AS sui ON sui.id = ssi.user_id JOIN union_role_staff AS urs ON urs.staff_id = ssi.id WHERE sui. STATUS IN (0, 3)
AND urs.role_id
#{roleId}
GROUP BY sci.id

SELECT sdi.id AS `depart_id`, sdi.comp_id AS `company_id`, count(sui.id) AS `num` FROM sys_department_info AS sdi JOIN union_staff_depart AS usd ON usd.department_id LIKE CONCAT(sdi.id, '\_%') OR usd.department_id = sdi.id JOIN sys_staff_info AS ssi ON ssi.id = usd.staff_id JOIN sys_user_info AS sui ON sui.id = ssi.user_id AND sui.status IN (0, 3) JOIN union_role_staff AS urs ON urs.staff_id = ssi.id
AND urs.role_id
#{id}
GROUP BY sdi.id
